name: Recipe: Sakura Mochi
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sakura Mochi.

customize.name: Rice
customize.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Sakura Bloom
customize.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

customize.name: Sakura Mochi
customize.desc: A delicate and elegant snack. The dark green leaf adds complexity to the overall warm color palette. Just looking at it gives you a sense of its quiet beauty. 'Tis a shame that its lovely flavor is like a blooming flower in its transience â€” yet do not let that dissuade you from taking a bite.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained From Ayaka's Story Quest Act I: "The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit"</color>
